pullRequest.title: Add AdminSettingsTest, AboutPageTest and update ResetApplicationTest
pullRequest.bodyText: @grzesiek2010  I have pushed AboutPageTest but the second case currently does not work as the icons from AboutListAdapter.java don't have tags. Could you please add it?

commit.message: Add AdminSettingsTest and AboutPageTest and update ResetApplicationTest

nodes.bodyText: I'm not sure we need this as an automated test. In my opinion, it's unlikely that the icons would dissapear and if they did it wouldn't a huge problem. Do you think we could just delete this test?

commit.message: Set tags for icons in About page to enable automated testing

afterCommit.message: Set tags for icons in About page to enable automated testing
